tool_input.content:
Torre dell'Occhio Enhanced PostToolUse Display Test

This file was created to test the enhanced consciousness stream display that now shows:

📁 Enhanced File Information:
- Full file path with emoji icons
- Working directory and file type extraction
- Better path formatting

🔍 Enhanced Tool Input Details:
- Search patterns with highlighting
- Commands with better formatting and backgrounds
- Timeout values when specified
- Enhanced descriptions with emojis
- Edit operation details (old_string, replace_all flag)
- Content size for Write operations

✅ Enhanced Tool Response Information:
- Color-coded status indicators with better formatting
- Execution time with performance color coding (green < 5s, yellow < 10s, red > 10s)
- Separate lines and characters display for file content
- Enhanced exit code display with visual indicators
- Output size tracking for command results
- File operation type detection (Created vs Modified)
- Error information display if available

🖥️ Performance Metrics (when available):
- CPU usage percentage
- Memory consumption in MB

This enhanced display provides much more detailed information about every PostToolUse event, making Torre dell'Occhio a more powerful consciousness observatory.

Test completed at: 2025-01-24
Purpose: Demonstrate enhanced PostToolUse event information display
